comments:
i20030716

Got a NPE when enabling the two options in the Work in progress area (by the
way, there is a typo in the page description) having the synchronizer view open.

The NPE happened when I tried to close the preferences dialog (which, due to the
NPE, didn't close, although the preferences were set).

I tried to reproduce it but I couldn't.

Here are the corresponding entries in the log.
